title: Why give Udyr true damage?
body:
Why is it necessary for Udyr to have true damage? God knows he already has everything else...

his items don't give it to him, he didn't have red buff, he doesn't have any in his kit yet he still manages to do true damage... great

replies.body: looks like you got ganked by the GoonSquad

> [{quoted}](name=TerenceMckenna2g,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=RnTaVjvA,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-12-16T11:42:51.395+0000)
>
> looks like you got ganked by the GoonSquad

lmfao

its a deathrecap bug. Its the same as when i play lucian and  get 5% true damage to myself  in recap or when a lb has 1080 truedamage recap on her r(q), also, if you have deathdance, one of the things in the deathrecap turn to true aswell
its a secret spy code message from acronymic dystopia it stands for tower defence aka go kill yoursef
